name: Siu-Wing Cheng
content: Siu-Wing Cheng Siu-Wing Cheng Professor Department of Computer Science and Engineering HKUST, Clear Wate Bay Hong Kong Emai: scheng@cse.ust.hk I enjoy doing research in algorithms, data structures, and computational geometry. I have written a book, Delaunay Mesh Generation, with Tamal Dey and Jonathan Shewchuk. It is a thorough guide to Delaunay triangulation and mesh generation by Delaunay refinement. SelectedProfessionalActivities ACM Distinguished Member for scientific contributions to computing. Editorial board members of Computing in Geometry and Topology and Computational Geometry: Theory and Applications. Program co-chair of the 31st International Symposium on Algorithms and Computation, December 14-18, 2020, Hong Kong. Program co-chair of the 30th Annual Symposium on Computational Geometry, June 8-11, 2014, Kyoto, Japan. Advisory committee member of the International Symposium on Algorithms and Computation (ISAAC). Chair of the Asian Association for Algorithms and Computation (AAAC). SelectedUniversityServices Associate Dean (Undergraduate Studies) of the School of Engineering, HKUST, January 2016 - December 2019. Acting Head of the Department of Computer Science and Engineering, HKUST, August 2013 - December 2014. Associate Head of the Department of Computer Science and Engineering, HKUST, September 2007 - August 2011.
